title: internal server error 500 - cant finish installation of oc5.0.6 (dont even with 1click-installation opensuse)
body:
hey guys,

wanted to give oc 5.0.6 a try (still waiting for one fix on external smb storage ) but now got a huge problem with oc at all. installed oc 5.0.6 on opensuse 12.1 manuel and already via 1-click-install, going to localhost/owncloud, getting the installation wizzard like:

enter adminname:
enter adminpassword:
advanced
sqlite or mysql

typing admin-name + password, klicking sqlite , klicking finish setup and getting a white page on my opensuse, and if doing this wizzard on a win7 pc im getting internal server error 500. a little submessage says something like: error while trying to process informations. unexpected condition occured.

logs: 
linux-wnrb:/srv/www/htdocs/owncloud # tail -f /var/log/apache2/error_log
[wed may 22 15:53:24 2013] [error] [client xxx.x.x.xxx] file does not exist: /srv/www/htdocs/favicon.ico
[wed may 22 15:55:18 2013] [error] [client xxx.x.x.xxx] client denied by server configuration: /srv/www/htdocs/owncloud/data/htaccesstest.txt
[wed may 22 15:55:18 2013] [error] [client xxx.x.x.xxx] file does not exist: /srv/www/htdocs/core
[wed may 22 15:55:18 2013] [error] [client xxx.x.x.xxx] php fatal error: cannot make non static method pear::iserror() static in class mdb2_schema in /srv/www/htdocs/owncloud/3rdparty/mdb2/schema.php on line 2767, referer: http://xxx.x.x.xxx/owncloud/
[wed may 22 15:56:39 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] directory index forbidden by options directive: /srv/www/htdocs/

linux-wnrb:/srv/www/htdocs/owncloud # tail -f data/owncloud.log
{"app":"php","message":"non-static method pear::iserror() should not be called statically at \/srv\/www\/htdocs\/owncloud\/lib\/db.php#308","level":2,"time":1369229467}
{"app":"php","message":"cannot make non static method pear::iserror() static in class mdb2_schema at \/srv\/www\/htdocs\/owncloud\/3rdparty\/mdb2\/schema.php#2767","level":4,"time":1369229467}


if i wont edit my /.htaccess and add the following option, i can't see anything besides a white/blank page or the error below the option:
   options +followsymlinks

you don't have permission to access /owncloud/ on this server.

additionally, a 404 not found error was encountered while trying to use an errordocument to handle the request.


someone out there who could help me? :/
thanks in advice.

regards
yaerox
